author: Cecilia D'Anastasio
title: A Twitch Streamer Is Exposing Coronavirus Scams Live
description: Kitboga has built a following by trolling telemarketers. Covid-19 opportunists have given him a whole new crop of targets.
content:
Earlier this week, live on Twitch, the streamer Kitboga attempted to place a wholesale order for an essential oil that, according to the woman on the phone with him, cured Covid-19. 
There is, of course, no cure for Covid-19, the disease that has infected hu… [+4133 chars]
